1011011001111011 1000101100000100 1 -> sum: 0100000110000000, cout: 1
1010101101001110 0101111011000110 0 -> sum: 0000101000010100, cout: 1
1110001010100100 1101011011101111 0 -> sum: 1011100110010011, cout: 1

1100101000000101 1101100101100001 0 -> sum: 1010001101100110, cout: 1

1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0

0111111111111111 1000000000000001 1 -> sum: 0000000000000001, cout: 1
